name: adc_gtm_monitor_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()

def getGTMMonitorList():
    '''
    to get the list of GTM monitors

    '''

    gtm_monitor_list = []
    adc_gtm_monitor_list = connect_db.appviewx.gm.find()
    for device in adc_gtm_monitor_list:
        gtm_monitor_list.append(device)
    return gtm_monitor_list
description: To get a list of GTM monitor
_keywords: To get a list of GTM monitor
